title: Senior Mechanical Engineer
description: Lead mechanical design and analysis for offshore platforms. Minimum 8 years experience in petrochemical industry.
requirements: 8+ years experience in Oil & Gas industry
Strong knowledge of ASME codes and standards

title: Aerospace Systems Engineer
description: Design and develop aircraft systems integration. Work with international aerospace manufacturers.

title: Maritime Operations Manager
description: Oversee vessel operations and port logistics. Manage shipping schedules and regulatory compliance.

description: Implement and maintain healthcare IT systems. Support digital transformation initiatives.

title: Defence Systems Analyst
description: Analyze and optimize defence systems performance. Support military technology development projects.
